description: To create an ANH file, select File → New... → CREATE NEW , choose a category, select a document, and click "Choose," select File → Save As... , name the file, choose the save location, and click Save .
To open an ANH file, select File → Open... → CREATE NEW , navigate to your file location, and click Open .
NOTE: In November 2010, Project ROME was discontinued but is still available for download.
